@charliprangley they've stopped the warning sirens and are scaling back the red zones. Seems like the worst is over but staying safe

Making the most of it #tsunami #eqnz https://t.co/FDJ2Ptm2nM
@Cheddam which hill? Message if you change your mind
@Cheddam do you need somewhere to go? We're Harbourview road?
@ClayJarGirl trains likely to be shut to inspect lines
Watching traffic jams as people evac Hutt, warning sirens for Tsunami is haunting. Hutt river is high and apparently Harbour has receded
@ClayJarGirl we're safe and sound but watching traffic jams of people evacuating
We're on the hill if anyone needs a place to come too
Tsunami waning sounded in Lower Hutt, Wellington. #eqnz
@developerjack as usual Twitter is the first to know and the fastest way to check everyone's ok
Aftershocks and adrenalin. Will be a long night! #eqnz
That was terrifying, I had a sudden intense awareness our house is on poles, on a hill. Hope chch is ok! #eqnz

@Chisa @Leuchtturm1917 thanks, love Tombows! I have a moleskin smart notebook on order which I can't wait to play with next!
@Chisa what pen do you use for your sketchnotes?
I'm excited by the opportunities for tech to bridge the empathy gap, as @aaronspence said "VR is an empathy machine" #Direction16
Challenge yourself with opinions that don't fit your own tiny world view, in the media you consume, the Twitter people you follow
If I've learned one thing from #Directions16, it's that it's never been more important to develop your own empathy
It is when we are faced with adversity and challenges, that our character, creativity and resilience is truly tested.
It was heartening to hear inspiring speakers reinforce the message that the hard work starts now, do not panic, do not give up.
Just finished 3 events over 4 days and 2 countries including 16 live interviews. Unfortunately time to return to reality...
@the_patima @Chisa sorry I missed catching up, needed to leave for flight. Thanks for sharing your excellent notes!
"VR is an empathy engine" @aaronspence - again the key theme of #direction16 comes into play https://t.co/Q1l2fN8cBt
@the_patima @Chisa I have a couple of speaker interviews in the lunch break but after that?
@Chisa @the_patima we should have a sketchnotes chat at #Direction16 ðŸ˜„

Listening to @annapickard if @SlackHQand making software feel human, great start to the day! #Direction16 https://t.co/euZmyBqOmj
